news.title: Samsung Clears Galaxy Z Fold 6 Stock, Price Drops to $499 from $1,899 Before Black Friday
news.description: Black Friday is now live at Samsung, and the deal on the Galaxy Z Fold 6 is absolutely mind-blowing.
news.api_content: Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6. The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents s… [+2875 chars]
news.summary:
Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents substantial savings across all storage variants of the Z Fold 6.
The deal kicks off with an instant $700 discount on all storage configurations of the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
Best Deal Ever SeenThe Galaxy Z Fold 6 itself is a marvel of modern smartphone technology and show Samsung capacity of innovation.
Ultimately, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 is running on Android 14 (with Samsung’s One UI) and offers a refined user experience tailored for its unique form factor.
news.text_preview:
Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6. The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents substantial savings across all storage variants of the Z Fold 6.

The deal kicks off with an instant $700 discount on all storage configurations of the Galaxy Z Fold 6. This means the 256GB model, originally priced at $1,899, now starts at just $1,199. The same $700 reduction applies to the 512GB and 1TB versions which brings their prices down significantly as well. This alone is a great offer- considering the device’s high-end specifications and innovative design.

See at Samsung.com

However, the savings don’t stop there. Samsung is sweetening the deal even further with an enhanced trade-in program: Customers can receive up to $1,200 off the original price when they trade in an eligible device. This trade-in offer is stackable with a $200 immediate discount and reduces the price of the 256...
news.short_summary:
Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents substantial savings across all storage variants of the Z Fold 6.
The deal kicks off with an instant $700 discount on all storage configurations of the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
Best Deal Ever SeenThe Galaxy Z Fold 6 itself is a marvel of modern smartphone technology and show Samsung capacity of innovation.
Ultimately, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 is running on Android 14 (with Samsung’s One UI) and offers a refined user experience tailored for its unique form factor..

news.title: This Second Price Drop on the Samsung T9 SSD Brings It to a Record Low Price, Black Friday Starts Early
news.description: Amazon has decided to lower the price -once again- on Samsung's excellent portable SSD.
news.api_content: This Saturday, Amazon has made (another) significant price reduction on the Samsung T9 4TB Portable SSD, bringing it down to an incredible $292, a steep drop from its original price of $549. This rep… [+2383 chars]
news.summary:
This Saturday, Amazon has made (another) significant price reduction on the Samsung T9 4TB Portable SSD, bringing it down to an incredible $292, a steep drop from its original price of $549.
This represents a massive 47% discount and marks a record low for this popular external storage solution just ahead of Black Friday.
See at AmazonOur Favorite Portable SSDInvesting in the Samsung T9 Portable SSD offers numerous advantages and makes it an excellent choice for anyone in need of reliable and high-performance storage.
The versatility of the Samsung T9 further enhances its appeal: It is compatible with a wide range of devices including PCs, gaming consoles, tablets and smartphones like the iPhone 16 or Galaxy S24 Ultra.
As we approach the holiday season (and closer to Black Friday), this deal on the Samsung T9 presents an excellent opportunity for gift-giving or treating yourself.
news.text_preview:
This Saturday, Amazon has made (another) significant price reduction on the Samsung T9 4TB Portable SSD, bringing it down to an incredible $292, a steep drop from its original price of $549. This represents a massive 47% discount and marks a record low for this popular external storage solution just ahead of Black Friday.

Given the previous stock shortages earlier this month, it’s uncertain how many units are available in this new batch.

See at Amazon

Our Favorite Portable SSD

Investing in the Samsung T9 Portable SSD offers numerous advantages and makes it an excellent choice for anyone in need of reliable and high-performance storage. One of the standout features of this SSD is its exceptional speed: with read and write speeds reaching up to 2,000MB/s, the T9 allows users to transfer large files quickly and efficiently. This speed is beneficial for professionals such as video editors and photographers who frequently work with high-resolution content and enables them to load, edit,...

news.title: Tough votes on Trump Cabinet picks could pose big risks for midterm Senate candidates
news.description: Lawmakers running for reelection loathe tough votes. And for senators up in purple states in two years, those tough votes are coming early.
news.api_content:
Lawmakers running for reelection loathe tough votes. And for senators up in purple states in two years, those tough votes are coming early.
President-elect Donald Trump is moving at a lightning pace… [+5762 chars]
news.summary:
"The base is watching how they handle Trump's nominees," one Republican said.
For frontline senators who hold the key to the next Senate majority, navigating their confirmations will be a minefield.
Some of Trump's nominees are not anticipated to run into significant roadblocks.
"There will be Trump voters who remember how Republican senators handle these nominations.
"President Trump and JD Vance are going to be running the Senate," Alabama Sen. Tommy Tuberville, a Trump ally, said on Fox Business this week.
news.text_preview:
"The base is watching how they handle Trump's nominees," one Republican said.

Lawmakers running for reelection loathe tough votes. And for senators up in purple states in two years, those tough votes are coming early.

President-elect Donald Trump is moving at a lightning pace to stock up his administration, mixing in conventional picks like Florida Sen. Marco Rubio for secretary of state with controversial moves like putting up Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz as attorney general and Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. for health and human services secretary. For frontline senators who hold the key to the next Senate majority, navigating their confirmations will be a minefield.

Republicans will be defending the seats of North Carolina Sen. Thom Tillis and Maine Sen. Susan Collins, while Democrats will be working to protect Georgia Sen. Jon Ossoff and Michigan Sen. Gary Peters. Their confirmation votes for Trump's Cabinet picks offer a chance to prove bipartisan bona fides, but backing a nominee who is to...
news.short_summary:
"The base is watching how they handle Trump's nominees," one Republican said.
For frontline senators who hold the key to the next Senate majority, navigating their confirmations will be a minefield.
Some of Trump's nominees are not anticipated to run into significant roadblocks.
"There will be Trump voters who remember how Republican senators handle these nominations.
"President Trump and JD Vance are going to be running the Senate," Alabama Sen. Tommy Tuberville, a Trump ally, said on Fox Business this week..
